summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of TaNow Online IPTV Directory Website. All core features working correctly including homepage, navigation, search, countries/categories/channels pages, IPTV player modal, legal pages, and responsive design.
passed_tests: Homepage loads correctly with hero section, stats, categories, and countries
Navigation menu works (Home, Countries, Categories, All Channels, About)
Mobile menu toggle works on mobile viewport
Search overlay opens and closes correctly
Countries page loads with 231 country cards and filters work
Categories page loads with 29 category cards
Channels page loads with 24 channel cards and pagination
Channel filtering by country and category works
IPTV Player modal opens when clicking a channel and closes properly
Privacy Policy page loads with proper content
Terms of Service page loads with proper content
Disclaimer page loads with proper content
About page loads with proper content
FAQ page accordion functionality works (10 FAQ items)
Contact page form displays correctly (3 form fields)
Ad placeholder slots are present (leaderboard, sidebar, in-content)
Responsive design works on mobile viewport (390x844)
